stripped_text: Whenever you take 1 or more tags, if you had no tags, you may install 1 connection resource from your grip, paying 2 credits less. As an additional cost to trash a connection resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ.
text: Whenever you take 1 or more tags, if you had no tags, you may install 1 connection resource from your grip, paying 2[credit] less. As an additional cost to trash a connection resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ.
title: Sebastião Souza Pessoa: Activist Organizer

flavor: As the riot turned to open conflict, Seb looked down at the gun in his hand. The time for peace was over.
stripped_text: Play only if you are not tagged. Run HQ. If successful, take 1 tag and access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Access -> Trash 1 card from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing.
text: Play only if you are not tagged. Run HQ. If successful, take 1 tag and access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Access → Trash 1 card from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing.
title: Eye for an Eye

stripped_text: Play only if you are not tagged. Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, take 1 tag. When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 resource from your heap, paying 2 credits less. Threat 3 -> When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 program from your heap.
text:
Play only if you are not tagged.
Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, take 1 tag.
When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 resource from your heap, paying 2[credit] less.
Threat 3 → When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 program from your heap.
title: Privileged Access

flavor: He allowed himself five minutes. He wished for more.
stripped_text: +1 mu When your turn ends, place 1 power counter on this hardware if you are tagged. Whenever you remove 1 or more tags, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 2 cards. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] When your turn ends, place 1 power counter on this hardware if you are tagged. Whenever you remove 1 or more tags, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 2 cards. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Amanuensis

flavor: Even a barren server can provide a feast, if you are patient enough.
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Whenever you would access a card in Archives, you may host it faceup on this program instead. (It is not installed.) Use this ability only once each time you breach Archives. When the Corp purges virus counters, they trash 2 cards from HQ at random. Trash this program.
text: [interrupt] → Whenever you would access a card in Archives, you may host it faceup on this program instead. (It is not installed.) Use this ability only once each time you breach Archives. When the Corp purges virus counters, they trash 2 cards from HQ at random. Trash this program.
title: Heliamphora

flavor:
“I've been a pack runner since I was ten. My uncle got me started after Eduardo took a bullet to the hip. It's only recently that people have started cheering when I leave a cop lying in the dirt.”
—Gabi Saka
stripped_text: click, trash: Gain 5 credits and remove 1 tag. click, trash: Gain 9 credits and take 1 tag. Use this ability only if you are not tagged.
text: [click], [trash]: Gain 5[credit] and remove 1 tag. [click], [trash]: Gain 9[credit] and take 1 tag. Use this ability only if you are not tagged.
title: Friend of a Friend

flavor: “Some info from our mutual friends, Professor. Now, about my daughter's grades…”
stripped_text: Whenever you breach HQ or R&D while you are tagged, access 1 additional card. Threat 3 -> As an additional cost to trash this resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text: Whenever you breach HQ or R&D while you are tagged, access 1 additional card. Threat 3 → As an additional cost to trash this resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
title: Manuel Lattes de Moura

stripped_text: Limit 1 hosted card. Access -> 1 credit: Host the non-agenda card you are accessing faceup on this program. (If it was installed, it becomes uninstalled.) Whenever you breach HQ, if this program has a hosted Corp card, you may pay 1 credit and trash this program to access 2 additional cards.
text: Limit 1 hosted card. Access → 1[credit]: Host the non-agenda card you are accessing faceup on this program. (If it was installed, it becomes uninstalled.) Whenever you breach HQ, if this program has a hosted Corp card, you may pay 1[credit] and trash this program to access 2 additional cards.
title: Cupellation

flavor:
“They‘ll be talking about me for years.”
—Arissana Rocha Nahu
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal 3 cards in HQ at random. Add 2 of the revealed cards to the top and/or bottom of R&D.
text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal 3 cards in HQ at random. Add 2 of the revealed cards to the top and/or bottom of R&D.
title: Burner

flavor: “Listen up, garotinha, maybe you'll learn something.”
stripped_text: Whenever you breach R&D, if you are allowed to access 2 or more cards in R&D during this breach, you may access 1 additional card.
text: Whenever you breach R&D, if you are allowed to access 2 or more cards in R&D during this breach, you may access 1 additional card.
title: “Pretty” Mary da Silva

flavor: Strength in the palm of your hand.
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a piece of AP or destroyer ice during a run, that ice gets +1 strength and gains "Subroutine End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards." after its other subroutines for the remainder of that run.
text: Whenever you rez a piece of AP or destroyer ice during a run, that ice gets +1 strength and gains “[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.” after its other subroutines for the remainder of that run.
title: Thunderbolt Armaments: Peace Through Power

stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Whenever a run begins, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to rez up to 2 pieces of ice protecting the attacked server, ignoring all costs. When this turn ends, derez 2 pieces of ice protecting that server.
text:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it.
Whenever a run begins, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to rez up to 2 pieces of ice protecting the attacked server, ignoring all costs. When this turn ends, derez 2 pieces of ice protecting that server.
title: Lightning Laboratory

flavor: Thunderbolt naturally offered city hardening solutions.
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed piece of ice. If you do, the rezzed ice gets +3 strength for the remainder of that run. Use this ability only once per turn. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed piece of ice. If you do, the rezzed ice gets +3 strength for the remainder of that run. Use this ability only once per turn. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Brasília Government Grid

flavor: Our fist shall hold the world.
stripped_text: Whenever you finish resolving an operation or an action on an expendable card, look at the top card of R&D. You may trash that card. The first time you trash a card from R&D during each of your turns, gain 2 credits.
stripped_title: Nuvem SA: Law of the Land
text: Whenever you finish resolving an operation or an action on an expendable card, look at the top card of R&D. You may trash that card. The first time you trash a card from R&D during each of your turns, gain 2[credit].
title: Nuvem SA: Law of the Land

flavor:
“General, for a successful coup d'état, you need the people on your side.”
—CEO Braganza
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may move 1 advancement counter from an installed card to an installed card you can advance. If this server is not protected by ice, you may also place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
text: When your turn begins, you may move 1 advancement counter from an installed card to an installed card you can advance. If this server is not protected by ice, you may also place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
title: Hearts and Minds

flavor: Don’t think about it. You’ll sleep better.
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following: * Place 1 advancement counter on each of up to 2 installed cards you can advance. * Remove all virus counters from 1 installed card. Threat 3 -> You may also resolve the other mode. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text:
Resolve 1 of the following:
  • Place 1 advancement counter on each of up to 2 installed cards you can advance.
  • Remove all virus counters from 1 installed card.
Threat 3 → You may also resolve the other mode. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
title: Business As Usual
